<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=1923) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 164 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=53), [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1919); Expert in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Requirements**
You are adjacent to a creature that is at least one size larger than you and is willing to be your mount.

</column>

---

You and your mount can spring into action at a moment's notice. You [Mount](/Actions.aspx?ID=96) the creature and [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) to issue it an order of your choice.
